description.en: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.ar: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.br: Formado ao longo das eras nas areias aquáticas da Ilha Coral.
description.cns: 于珊瑚岛的水砂深处久经磨砺而形成。
description.de: Im Laufe der Jahrhunderte tief im wässrigen Sand der Koralleninsel geformt.
description.fi: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.fil: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.fr: Cette arme a été façonnée au cours des ages, immergée dans les profondeurs sablonneuses de l’Île Corail.
description.id: Terbentuk selama berabad-abad jauh di dalam pasir berair Coral Island.
description.it: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.jp: 珊瑚島の水っぽい砂浜の奥深くで長い年月をかけて形成されました。
description.kr: 코랄 아일랜드의 촉촉한 모래 깊은 곳에서 긴 세월에 걸쳐 형성되었습니다.
description.nl: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.pl: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.ru: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.sp: Se formó a lo largo de los siglos en lo profundo de las arenas acuosas de Isla Coral.
description.sw: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.th: สร้างขึ้นในยุคสมัยลึกลงไปในผืนทรายชุ่มน้ำแห่งเกาะ Coral
description.tw: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of Coral Island.
description.vi: Được hình thành qua nhiều thời đại sâu trong bãi cát đầy nước của Coral Island.
